title: why i grew a mustache
summary: Why this man decided to grow a mustache
content: I decided to grow a mustache because it makes me feel alive.

title: in the country
summary: What it's like having a mustache in the country
content: I've never felt more like a cowboy

title: the mustache brothers
summary: What it's like having a mustache with your brother.
content: I've never felt closer to my brother than when we both have big mustaches
